snippet: The detainee, whose identity and nationality were not immediately released, was found unconscious in his cell, the United States military said.
abstract: Guantanamo Bay prisoner, a former hunger striker whose name has not yet been released, dies; the Naval Criminal Investigation Service is investigating the death, and the detainee's remains will undergo an autopsy before they are repatriated.
lead_paragraph: The detainee, whose identity and nationality were not immediately released, was found unconscious in his cell, the United States military said.

headline.main: Guantánamo Detainee, a Former Hunger Striker, Dies
headline.print_headline: Guantánamo Detainee, a Former Hunger Striker, Dies
